00002   int flags;
00003   uint dev;
00004   uint sector;

00006   struct buf *next;

00008   uchar data[512];
00009 };
00010 #define B_BUSY  0x1  // buffer is locked by some process
00011 #define B_VALID 0x2  // buffer has been read from disk
00012 #define B_DIRTY 0x4  // buffer needs to be written to disk
